amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that establishes a new definition of what constitutes a wetland as well as a detailed wetlands classification system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 25 in the Congressional Record of May 9) to delete provisions of the bill that establishes a new definition for wetlands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilchrest amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 247 (Roll no. 333).
